name: Tree Tree
description:
Tree Tree is a Game made for the #TeamTrees Youtubers movement to help the world by planting 20Millions tree. you can be a part of this by donating following the link:

https://teamtrees.org/

The Game is simple all you have to do is go around and plant trees and make sure to fulfill their needs and don't let them burn by Thunder , until you reach 100% O2 Level to clear the skies and save the World.

The clouds will go around and the Rain will help you grow the trees as well as putting the fire down.

The Controls:

PS: This is a FanMade Game not associated with the guys at #TeamTrees and the Arbor Day Foundation
